oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Non oscillatory scheme for open channel problems
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: RAO, MSVP
PANI, BS
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The governing flow equations that describe the flow in open channels were solved by using an Essentially Non Oscillatory scheme. Different flow situations in open channels were considered. The results indicate that the scheme is an excellent shock capturing technique.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: HYDRODYNAMICS: THEORY AND APPLICATIONS, VOLS 1 AND 2,1223-1228
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Second International Conference on Hydrodynamics,HONG KONG, HONG KONG,DEC 16-19, 1996
